column1: 5199,Irredeemable Ant-Man (2006) #1,1,29485,62,"Introducing the world's worst superhero! When a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent gets a hold of Hank Pym's new Ant-Man suit, you know there's trouble. He's not concerned with saving the world. He's concerned with getting through the day and getting a leg up on life!",
